extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • TileManager

        public TileManager()
        constructor used to initilize TileManager objects

    • Method Detail

      • generateNewTile

        public Tile generateNewTile(java.util.Random rand,
                            int x,
                            int y,
                            int width,
                            int height,
                            java.awt.Color color)
        This method generate a new subclass of Tile. It will randomly decide which type to return. based off of the different classes that extend Tile in the current directory assumes the Random and Color objects that are passed in are valid (not null).
        Parameters:
        rand - Random object used to select type of Tile
        x - xcoord for the Tile to be created
        y - ycoord for the Tile to be created
        width - width of Tile to be created
        height - height of Tile to be created
        color - color of the Tile to be created
        Returns:
        a new Tile based to be added to the DrawingPanel

      • addTile

        public boolean addTile(Tile tile)
        add the given tile to the end of your tile manager's list of tiles. Returns true if the tile was added, false if the Tile object passed in was null.
        Parameters:
        tile - the tile to be added to this manager
        Returns:
        indicates whether this tile had been added successfully or not

      • drawAll

        public void drawAll(java.awt.Graphics g)
        causes all of the tiles in the tile manager to draw themselves on the screen using the given graphical pen
        Parameters:
        g - graphics pen used to draw

      • raise

        public void raise(int x,
                  int y)
        Called when the user left-clicks. If the coordinate passed in touch any tiles the topmost of these tiles is moved to the very top (end) of the list.
        Parameters:
        x - xcoord clicked
        y - ycoord clicked

      • lower

        public void lower(int x,
                  int y)
        Called when the user Shift-left-clicks. If these coordinates touch any tiles, the topmost of these tiles is moved to the very bottom (beginning) of the list.
        Parameters:
        x - xcoord cliked
        y - ycoord cliked

      • delete

        public void delete(int x,
                   int y)
        Called when the user right-clicks. If the input coordinates touch any tiles, the topmost of the tiles from the list will be deleted
        Parameters:
        x - xcoord clicked
        y - ycoord clicked

      • deleteAll

        public void deleteAll(int x,
                      int y)
        Called when the user Shift-right-clicks. If the input coordinates touch any tiles, all such tiles will be deleted from the list
        Parameters:
        x - xcoord clicked
        y - ycoord clicked

      • shuffle

        public void shuffle(int width,
                    int height)
        Called when the user types S. All the tiles are reordered in the list into a random order and all tiles get new random x/y pixel positions
        Parameters:
        width - width of the gui
        height - height of the gui
